summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Arma server management panel. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI works well with tactical theme, but has minor issues with server control button states and chart rendering warnings.

ui_bugs.issue: Restart button becomes disabled after starting server and cannot be clicked

design_issues.issue: Recharts console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height)

passed_tests: User registration and login with JWT authentication
Dashboard displays system resources with pie charts
Add server instance functionality works correctly
Player count and server details display
Tactical UI theme with military aesthetics
Background images for Arma Reforger servers
All backend API endpoints (13/13 tests passed)

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (1 minor UI issue with restart button)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix server restart button state management - button becomes disabled after starting server and cannot be clicked. Also address Recharts console warnings for pie chart dimensions.
